articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Bumblebees learn to solve puzzles by watching peers, study finds - BBC
articles.description: Scientists who trained bees to open a puzzle find that they pass the knowledge on to their colonies.
articles.content:
Bumblebees learn to solve puzzles by watching their more experienced peers, scientists in Britain have found.
Experts from Queen Mary University of London trained a set of bees to open a puzzle box … [+2053 chars]
